title: Crime Alert 06.07.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.07.21
description:
88-year-old man charged with murder after shooting the man who asked him do housework. Women fires gun at boyfriend but says she didn't mean to shoot him. The bullet ricochets.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
